title: akepalos.github.io
short_description: A website created just for fun.
description: I've made this website just for fun. This was inspired from the deep web myth I saw while browsing on the internet.

title: OTG-Nilboard
short_description: Android app to suppress the default keyboard.
description: OTG-Nilboard keyboard literally does nothing and is purposively made for bluetooth or OTG keyboard users.

title: Lanzaplicacion
short_description: Android launcher with minimalist UI.
description: Super minimalist and primitive-looking UX made without any other intent. I've made this app purely just for fun.

title: Nougat
short_description: Dynamic programming language.
description: Nougat programming language is a general-purpose dynamic scripting and programming language.

title: La Pregunta
short_description: A very short multi-platform visual novel.
description: A very-short multiplatform visual novel game I've made based on an example story by Ren'Py.

title: UrPh News
short_description: Minimalistic news outlet Android app.
description: Just another news outlet app that uses NewsAPI to fetch reliable and updated news in the Philippines in an oversimplified way.

title: Fakfak
short_description: A fun 2D game inspired from Flappy Bird.
description: My very first game development collaboration with Lady Selene. Heavily inspired from the famous game called "Flappy Bird."

title: j9n8.github.io
short_description: A team of two game developers.
description: Our team aims to explore, grow, create, learn, and develop fun games everyone can enjoy and apps everyone can use.

title: PVault
short_description: Secure Android user-friendly password vault.
description: PVault is an Android application with a simple yet secure way to store and manage your passwords.

title: SLaunch
short_description: Simple yet aesthetic interactive launcher.
description: SLaunch is the most simple yet aesthetic-looking interactive Android application launcher with for real fluid UI and UX.

title: Musiccini
short_description: Arduino Ultra-lightweight Music Synthesis
description: Musiccini is intended to be super duper lightweight library for synthesizing music in Arduino with a buzzer.

title: Fakfak Bird on Arduino Nano
short_description: Plain yet fun game using an Arduino Nano.
description: A handheld simple Flappy Bird-like game in Arduino Nano with a monochromatic 0.9 inch OLED display.

title: Batch2Exe
short_description: Windows batch file to executable file converter.
description: Batch2Exe is a program for converting batch files to executable files on Windows with user friendly GUI.

title: Arduquarium
short_description: Automated aquarium recycling with Arduino UNO.
description: An automated aquarium water cycler built using an Arduino UNO board to maintain optimal water conditions on aquariums.

title: Recognito
short_description: Mini-silly image classifier UI with tensorflow and PyQT5.
description: A Python program that uses the power of PyQT5 and TensorFlow for identifying objects from image files.

title: VizhPort
short_description: Python program to monitor serial port with visualization.
description: VizhPort is a Python program that allows users to monitor the serial port with a graphical display using Pygtgraph.

title: PH4502C Sensor
short_description: Easy-to-use Arduino library for PH4502C sensor.
description: This Arduino library provides a convenient and easy-to-use interface for the PH4502C sensor, allowing you to effortlessly integrate it into your Arduino projects.

title: Anomalia
short_description: Arduino library for data processing anomalies.
description: The Anomalia library is an Arduino library designed to provide a flexible and efficient framework for handling anomaly events in your Arduino projects.

title: Navigador
short_description: Arduino library for dual DC motor navigation.
description: The Navigador Arduino library provides a convenient way to control the movement of a mobile robot or vehicle using an Arduino board.

title: MaskUp
short_description: Simple program that can identify if an individual is wearing a face mask.
description: MaskUp is an advanced Python program designed to accurately detect whether a person is wearing a mask from an available web camera.

title: VoxHAUT-Roamer
short_description: An interactive pet robot on ESP8266 and Android phone.
description: VoxHAUT combines various technologies such as the ESP8266 NodeMCU 1.0 microcontroller unit, the ESP8266 L293DD Motor Shield, AHT20 and BMP280 sensor,

title: Monitoria
short_description: Attendance monitoring system with ESP8266 NodeMCU and RFID.
description: Monitoria is a comprehensive attendance monitoring system that utilizes an ESP8266 microcontroller unit along with an RFID sensor to record attendance logs.

title: TCS3200 Sensor
short_description: Comprehensive Arduino library for TCS3200 color sensor.
description: Color sensing is a crucial aspect of many modern applications, from color detection and sorting in industrial processes to smart home automation systems.

title: Diwa
short_description: Arduino lightweight surface library for AI and ML.
description: Diwa is an Arduino lightweight library for Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) applications and development.
